name: Temple Gun
description:
My and Eraser_Cat's submission for the GMTK 2020 game jam!

Fight through ever-increasing hordes of enemies with a weapon that grows ever more powerful! Blast through destructible doors and make your way through different areas to the end!

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

HOLD Z or left click to aim, release to shoot

Explosion radius increases boundlessly with the number of enemies you kill, and it can kill you, so be careful!

Note: You can shoot through any wall.

Note 2: Some walls (barriers) are destructible, and some of those walls require a more powerful explosion to destroy.
